page.title: 12LOCAL LIBRARY SERVICES
page.content: The library has a varied collection of books including both fiction and non- fiction titles. The adult section is designed mainly for leisure reading and interest. It also has a small selection of reference books. The children's section caters for all ages. The fiction includes old favour- ites like WINNIE THE POOH and MARY POPPINS, while new titles and authors appear all the time. The non-fiction proves a good source of information for homework and hobbies. The library issues about 45000 books a year. It provides a service to the local schools and nurseries which use the library regularly. There is a courier service for elderly members of the village unable to visit the library.
